Literature.Title: Bioactivity and the first transmission electron microscopy immunogold studies of short de novo-designed antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Azad MA, Huttunen-Hennelly HE, Ross Friedman C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=<=530±20µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=<=530±20µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=<=530±20µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=<=530±20µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=<=5.8±0.3µg/ml)
